snippet.title: Melancholy Love - Yuri Visual Novel Trailer
snippet.description:
A coming-of-age Yuri Visual Novel between an elite student and a delinquent in an all-girls' high school. Demo now available on:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1387460/Melancholy_Love/
itch.io: https://kikaidigital.itch.io/melancholy-love
Follow Us: https://twitter.com/GamesKikai
Learn More: https://kikaiism.com/games/melancholy-love/

Amidst the garden of scented dreams
Elite and misfit, two extremes

One stands in spotlight, one cast in shadows
How will sparks flare as feelings grow?

As flowers bloom in the labyrinth
A lone Miss Saigon stands among the hyacinths

Like an apologetic, regretful dove
tells the story of melancholic love
